PSoC 6 Peripheral Driver Library
Data Fields
cy_stc_lpcomp_config_t Struct Reference
LPComp (Low Power Comparator) » Data Structures

Description

The LPCOMP configuration structure.

Data Fields

cy_en_lpcomp_out_t outputMode
 The LPCOMP's outputMode: Direct output, Synchronized output or Pulse output.
 
cy_en_lpcomp_hyst_t hysteresis
 Enables or disables the LPCOMP's hysteresis.
 
cy_en_lpcomp_pwr_t power
 Sets the LPCOMP power mode.
 
cy_en_lpcomp_int_t intType
 Sets the LPCOMP interrupt mode.
